code: import React from'react';import{useCart}from'../CartContext';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cart=()=>{const{cart,dispatch}=useCart();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleRemove=id=>{dispatch({type:'REMOVE_FROM_CART',id});};const handleCheckout=()=>{dispatch({type:'CLEAR_CART'});navigate('/checkout-success');};const totalPrice=cart.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+(item.discountedPrice||item.price)*(item.quantity||1),0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Shopping Cart"}),cart.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your cart is empty"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[cart.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image.url,alt:item.title,style:{width:'100px',height:'100px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",item.discountedPrice?item.discountedPrice.toFixed(2):item.price.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleRemove(item.id),children:"Remove"})]},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Total: $",totalPrice.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCheckout,children:"Checkout"})]})]});};export default Cart;
